kauf_auf_rechnung.credit_check_agreement_text: I agree that a credit check can be carried out on my person. I can revoke my consent at any time for the future. I am aware that a revocation has no effect on the lawfulness of the processing that has taken place up to the revocation and that in the event of a revocation not all payment methods can be offered to me.
kauf_auf_rechnung.credit_check_agreement_info_link_text: More information on the credit check.
kauf_auf_rechnung.payment_rejected_message: The payment option Buy Now Pay Later is currently not available.
